entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
